Title: Okawari-Boy Starzan-S
Description: ['On planet Kirakira live two tribes: Senobi and Robot. Senobi, quiet and peacefully set, settle down in the forest. Robot comes from the desert and starts war to take control of afforested grounds. A young hero coming from Senobi tries to appease the whole situation.']
Staff: [['Kojima, Masayuki', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Higuchi, Masakazu', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Kogawa, Yoriyasu', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Koyama, Takao', 'Script, Series Composition']]
